item.title: AdviseMessage

item.title: Text
item.description: GraphQL schema definition interface Text { text: String! language: Language! Show deprecated fields } window.onload = _ = { const deprecatedContainer = document.querySelectorAll('div.deprecated-entities-container')[0]; if (deprecatedContainer.children.length) { const list = document.querySelectorAll('li.deprecated-button-container')[0]; list.style.display = 'block'; console.log(list.style); } } Fields text(String!): language(Language!):
